languages.text: Представ перед конклавом флота Осознание, Паскаль Ханейманн покаялся в схизме. Отринув прежний идентификатор, запятнанный ересью, он принял не сохраненный каталогом позывной и сложил регалии магоса. Дальнейшая судьба его неизвестна, но в архивах есть сообщения о деятельности сурового карателя Кода, ошибочно идентифицированного как уже погибший к тому времени техножрец Медный шепот. Лицо его было скрыто маской, а целью его было дознание и уничтожение. Сей агент конклава прозревал всякий признак техноереси и расправлялся с посягающими на теоремы чистоты, изреченные предтечами.

Coming before the conclave of the Cognisance Fleet, Pasqal Haneumann repented of the schism. Casting off his former heresy-stained identifier, he accepted a designation unregistered by the catalogue and surrendered his Magos regalia. His fate remains unknown, but the archives contain reports on the activities of a stern castigator of the Code falsely identified as the Tech-Priest Brasswhisper, who was already deceased by that time. The face of this castigator was hidden behind a mask; his mission was interrogation and elimination. This agent of the conclave witnessed every sign of tech-heresy and exterminated all who endangered the theorems of purity granted by the forerunners.
languages.original_text: Представ перед конклавом флота Осознание, Паскаль Ханейманн покаялся в схизме. Отринув прежний идентификатор, запятнанный ересью, он принял не сохраненный каталогом позывной и сложил регалии магоса. traits.locale_text: Coming before the conclave of the Cognisance Fleet, Pasqal Haneumann repented of the schism. Casting away his former identifier, stained with heresy, he accepted a call sign that the catalogue didn't register and stepped down from the Magos position. His fate remains unknown, but the archives contain messages of activity of a stern castigator of the Code, who was falsely identified as a Tech-Priest Brasswhisper, deceased by that time. The face of this castigator was hidden behind a mask; his goals were questioning and elimination. This agent of the Conclave has seen every sign of tech-heresy and exterminated all who endangered the theorems of purity granted by the forerunners.

languages.text: 帕斯卡·哈努曼在真理开拓者舰队密会之中忏悔了自己的分裂行为。他抛弃了之前带有异端色彩的身份标识，接受了某个从未在目录中登记过的称号，并交出了他的贤者徽章。他的命运不得而知，但是，某些档案中记载了一些活动报告，描述了一名严厉的代码惩戒者。这位惩戒者使用的是技术神甫“铜语”的身份识别代码，但真正的铜语那时候早已去世。这位刽子手将面容隐藏在面具之后，他的任务就是审讯与歼灭。这位秘会的代理人曾目睹过各种各样的技术异端表现，而所有危及先驱所授予的纯洁定理的人，都被他无情消灭。
languages.original_text: Coming before the conclave of the Cognisance Fleet, Pasqal Haneumann repented of the schism. Casting off his former heresy-stained identifier, he accepted a designation unregistered by the catalogue and surrendered his Magos regalia. His fate remains unknown, but the archives contain reports on the activities of a stern castigator of the Code falsely identified as the Tech-Priest Brasswhisper, who was already deceased by that time. The face of this castigator was hidden behind a mask; his mission was interrogation and elimination. This agent of the conclave witnessed every sign of tech-heresy and exterminated all who endangered the theorems of purity granted by the forerunners.

traits.locale_text: 帕斯卡·哈努曼在真理开拓者舰队密会之中忏悔了自己的分裂行为。他抛弃了之前带有异端色彩的身份标识，接受了某个从未在目录中登记过的称号，并交出了他的贤者徽章。他的命运不得而知，但是，某些档案中记载了一些活动报告，描述了一名严厉的代码惩戒者。这位惩戒者使用的是技术祭司“铜语”的身份识别代码，但真正的铜语那时候早已去世。这位刽子手将面容隐藏在面具之后，他的任务就是审讯与歼灭。这位秘会的代理人曾目睹过各种各样的技术异端表现，而所有危及先驱所授予的纯洁定理的人，都被他无情消灭。

languages.text: Pasqal Haneumann trat vor die Konklave der Erkenntnisflotte und bereute die Spaltung. Er legte seine frühere, von der Ketzerei besudelte ID ab, akzeptierte ein Rufzeichen, das im Katalog nicht registriert war, und gab seine Magos-Insignien ab. Was aus ihm wurde, ist nicht bekannt. In den Archiven existieren jedoch Berichte über die Aktivitäten eines strengen Züchtigers des Codes, der fälschlicherweise als der Techpriester Messingflüsterer identifiziert wurde, welcher zu dieser Zeit bereits tot war. Das Gesicht dieses Züchtigers lag hinter einer Maske verborgen. Seine Mission bestand aus Verhören und Eliminierungen. Dieser Agent des Konklave hat jedes einzelne Anzeichen der Tech-Ketzerei erlebt und alle ausgelöscht, welche die von den Vorläufern überlieferten Theoreme der Reinheit gefährdet haben.

languages.text: Pasqal Haneumann se repentit du schisme devant le conclave de la Flotte de la Connaissance. Renonçant à son ancien identifiant entaché par l'hérésie, il en accepta un nouveau, non enregistré dans le catalogue, et restitua ses atours de magos. On ignore ce qu'il advint de lui, mais les archives contiennent des rapports sur les activités d'un sévère accusateur du Code ayant usurpé le nom de Murmecuivre, un technoprêtre mort des années plus tôt. Le visage de cet agent du conclave chargé de missions d'interrogation et d'élimination resta toujours dissimulé derrière un masque tandis qu'il traquait la moindre manifestation de technohérésie et exterminait ceux qui mettaient en péril les théorèmes de pureté légués par les anciens.
languages.original_text: Coming before the conclave of the Cognisance Fleet, Pasqal Haneumann repented of the schism. languages.text: Frente al cónclave de la Flota Conciencia, Pasqal Haneumann se arrepintió del cisma. Abandonó su identificador marcado por la herejía, aceptó un código sin registrar en el catálogo y entregó su equipamiento de magos. Su destino aún se desconoce, pero los archivos contienen informes sobre las actividades de un firme castigator del Código identificado erróneamente como la tecnosacerdote Susurro de latón, ya fallecida para entonces. El castigator ocultaba su rostro tras una máscara y su misión comprendía la interrogación y la eliminación. Este agente del cónclave ha presenciado todos los signos de la tecnoherejía y ha exterminado a todos cuantos han supuesto un peligro para los teoremas de la pureza de sus antecesores.

languages.text: コグニサンス艦隊評議会を前にして、パスカル・ヘニュマンは分離を悔い改めた。彼は異端に汚されたかつての識別子を捨て、まだ目録に登録されていない呼称を受け入れることで、マゴスの特権を放棄したのだ。パスカルがどのような最期を迎えたかはまだ定かでないが、アーカイブには掟を厳しく糾弾したキャスティゲイターの行動が記されている。その男は誤ってブラスウィスパー技術司祭と認定されており、記録時点で死亡している。キャスティゲイターの顔は仮面で隠されており、彼は尋問と抹殺を使命としていた。この評議会の代理人は技術異端者の兆候をひとつたりとも見逃さず、先人によって与えられた純潔の定理を脅かす者を残らず始末したという。
languages.original_text: Coming before the conclave of the Cognisance Fleet, Pasqal Haneumann repented of the schism. Casting off his former heresy-stained identifier, he accepted a designation unregistered by the catalogue and surrendered his Magos regalia. His fate remains unknown, but the archives contain reports on the activities of a stern castigator of the Code falsely identified as the Tech-Priest Brasswhisper, who was already deceased by that time. The face of this castigator was hidden behind a mask; his mission was interrogation and elimination. This agent of the conclave witnessed every sign of tech-heresy and exterminated all who endangered the theorems of purity granted by the forerunners.

languages.text: Malumat Filosu Meclisi önüne çıkan Pasqal Haneumann, bölünmeden pişmanlık duyduğunu söyledi. Kâfirlikle kirlenmiş eski kimliğini bir kenara attı, katalogda kaydı olmayan bir ad aldı ve Magos ünvanını bıraktı. İlerleyen dönemde ona ne olduğu bilinmiyor. Gelgelelim arşivlerde; o sırada çoktan ölmüş olan Tekno Rahip Pirinçfısıltı olarak hatalı bir şekilde tanımlanan, katı bir Kod cezacısına dair raporlar bulunuyor. Cezacının yüzünde bir maske varmış, görevi de sorgu ve infazmış. Her türlü tekno kâfirliğe şahit olmuş bu meclis hizmetkârı, önceki nesillerin sağladığı saflık teoremlerini tehlikeye atan herkesi ortadan kaldırıyormuş.
languages.original_text: Coming before the conclave of the Cognisance Fleet, Pasqal Haneumann repented of the schism. Casting off his former heresy-stained identifier, he accepted a designation unregistered by the catalogue and surrendered his Magos regalia. His fate remains unknown, but the archives contain reports on the activities of a stern castigator of the Code falsely identified as the Tech-Priest Brasswhisper, who was already deceased by that time. The face of this castigator was hidden behind a mask; his mission was interrogation and elimination. This agent of the conclave witnessed every sign of tech-heresy and exterminated all who endangered the theorems of purity granted by the forerunners.

traits.locale_text: Malumat Filosu'nun meclisinin önüne çıkan Pasqal Haneumann, bölünme sebebiyle pişmanlık duyduğunu söyledi. Kâfirlikle kirlenmiş eski tanımlayıcısını bir kenara attı, katalogda kaydı olmayan bir ad aldı ve Magos ünvanını terk etti. İlerleyen dönemde ona ne olduğu bilinmiyor ancak arşivlerde, o sırada çoktan ölmüş olan Tekno Rahip Pirinçfısıltı olarak hatalı bir şekilde tanımlanan, katı bir Kod cezalandırıcısına dair raporlar bulunmakta. Cezalandırıcının yüzünde bir maske varmış ve görevi sorgu ve infaz imiş. Her türlü tekno kâfirliğe şahit olmuş bu meclis hizmetkârı, önceki nesiller tarafından sağlanan saflık teoremlerini tehlikeye atan herkesi ortadan kaldırıyormuş.
